ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 11
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone! My name is Joe I live in Boston, go to school here.  Both my boyfriend (he ll be joining soon) and I play Everquest on the Rodcet nife server.
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone!

My name is Joe I live in Boston, go to school here. Both my boyfriend
(he'll be joining soon) and I play Everquest on the Rodcet nife server.
My charchter is Fentus, high elf wizard. I'm interested in creating a
glbt guild on rodcet nife also, maybe we could have the same guild name so
as to keep some continuity? i know of another gay person on rodcet nife
who is a friend of mine in real life, i'll be telling him about this soon.
So that is three poeple and i tihnk you only need 9, so just a couplke
more, let me know if you want to be in thisa guild ;) Interesting mailing
list huh? have fun, and may tunare guide you to her bosom.

-joe
